<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dueling Riposte](/Feats.aspx?ID=4811) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=601" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 146 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetypes** [Duelist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=58) (Level 10), [Duelist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=248) (Level 10)

**Prerequisites**
[Dueling Parry (Fighter)](/Feats.aspx?ID=4781)

**Trigger**
A creature within your reach critically fails a Strike against you

**Requirements**
You are benefiting from Dueling Parry

</column>

---

You elegantly counterattack against your flailing enemy. Make a melee Strike against or attempt to Disarm the triggering creature.

<title level="2">Dueling Riposte leads to...</title>
[Guiding Riposte](/Feats.aspx?ID=4843), [Improved Dueling Riposte](/Feats.aspx?ID=4836)
